analytics.title: Financial Analytics
analytics.description: Visualize your financial trends and patterns

financialHealth.heading: How it is calculated:
financialHealth.savingsRate: 3. Savings Rate: % of income saved (20%+ excellent)

income.heading: How it is calculated:
income.description: Sum of all active recurring income sources (monthly, weekly, biweekly, annual)

expenses.heading: How it is calculated:
expenses.oneTime: • One-time expenses: included if date falls in period
expenses.recurring: • Recurring expenses: included if overlaps with period (monthly equivalent)

subscriptions.heading: How it is calculated:
subscriptions.description: Sum of all active subscriptions (monthly, quarterly, annually, biannually)

installments.heading: How it is calculated:
installments.description: Sum of all active installment payments (monthly, biweekly, weekly)

taxes.heading: How it is calculated:
taxes.description: Period-specific taxes based on income (only calculated when income exists in the selected period)

debtsOwed.heading: How it is calculated:
debtsOwed.description: Sum of all active debts (unpaid) owed to you

netCashFlow.heading: How it is calculated:
netCashFlow.formula: Net Cash Flow = Income - Expenses - Subscriptions - Installments
netCashFlow.others: • Income, Subscriptions, Installments show all active (monthly equivalent)

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.

aiInsights.title: AI Insights

tooltip.heading: How it works:
tooltip.description: AI analyzes your financial data to provide personalized recommendations:

emptyState.title: No insights available yet
emptyState.description: Add more expenses and savings goals to get personalized insights

aiInsights.error: Failed to load insights. Please try again later.
aiInsights.cacheNotice: Insights are cached for 24 hours. Click refresh to generate new insights.

budgetOverview.title: Budget Overview
budgetOverview.description: All active budgets (each tracked within its own period)

tooltip.heading: How it works:
tooltip.description: Shows all currently active budgets aggregated together.
tooltip.periodNote: Each budget tracks expenses within its own time period (monthly, quarterly, or yearly).

infoNote.showing: Showing {count} active {budgets}. Each budget tracks expenses within its own defined time period.

status.reviewGoals: Review your goals and consider adjusting contributions

plannedSubscriptions.title: Planned Subscriptions
plannedSubscriptions.emptyState: No subscriptions planned for this month
plannedSubscriptions.error: Failed to load subscriptions. Please try again later.

plannedExpenses.title: Planned Expenses
plannedExpenses.description: Recurring expense payments for selected month
plannedExpenses.emptyState: No recurring expenses planned for this month
plannedExpenses.error: Failed to load expenses. Please try again later.

plannedInstallments.title: Planned Installments
plannedInstallments.emptyState: No installment payments planned for this month
plannedInstallments.error: Failed to load installments. Please try again later.

exchangeRates.title: Exchange Rates
exchangeRates.tooltip: Current exchange rates between major currencies. Rates are updated hourly and cached for performance.
